Ability.Name: B:Dancing Rune Weapon
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Obliterate", "target") == 1 and UnitPower("player") >= 60 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Death and Decay
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then CastSpellByID(49938) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: F:Howling Blast
U:Death Coil
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Death Coil", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Death Coil (Max RP)
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Death Coil", "target") == 1 and UnitPowerMax("player") == UnitPower("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Death Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Death Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Rune Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Rune Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Heart Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Heart Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
--Pause/the/rotation!
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Essen") or UnitBuff("player", "Trinken") then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Deathchill
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",51124) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Summon Gargoyle
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Obliterate", "target") == 1 and UnitPower("player") >= 60 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Empower Rune Weapon
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,R1 = GetRuneCooldown(1) local _,_,R2 = GetRuneCooldown(2) local _,_,R3 = GetRuneCooldown(3) local _,_,R4 = GetRuneCooldown(4) local _,_,R5 = GetRuneCooldown(5) local _,_,R6 = GetRuneCooldown(6) local levelCheck = UnitLevel("target")
if levelCheck ~= -1 then return false else if R1 == false and R2 == false and R3 == false and R4 == false and R5 == false and R6 == false then return true end end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Horn of Winter
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",58646,65991,58643,31634,37223) == nil and UnitBuffID("player",57623) ~= nil then return false else return true end

Ability.Name: USE:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: F:Frost Presence
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",48263) ~= nil then return false else return true end

Ability.Name: F:Howling Blast (AOE)
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Howling Blast", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Horn of Winter (Tank)
Ability.Lua:
local Horn, _, _, _, _, _, hwexpire = UnitBuffID("player", 57623)
if Horn ~= nill then hwexpire =(hwexpire - GetTime()) if hwexpire < 5 then return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: U:Scourge Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Scourge Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Rune Tap
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 80 then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Raise Dead
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("pet") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(46584) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Blood Boil
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Obliterate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Blood Fury
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 and IsSpellInRange("Obliterate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Blood Presence
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",48266) ~= nil then return false else return true end

Ability.Name: B:Blood Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Blood Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: B:Blood Tap
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,R1 = GetRuneCooldown(1) local _,_,R2 = GetRuneCooldown(2)
if R1 == false or R2 == false then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Bone Shield
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",49222) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Chains of Ice
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown( ) and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then if UnitIsEnemy("player", "mouseover") and UnitIsDead("mouseover") == nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: F:Frost Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Frost Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Frost Strike (TM)
B:Hysteria
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Obliterate", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Icebound Fortitude
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 40 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Icy Touch
Ability.Lua:
local dbFrostFever, _, _, _, _, _, dbexpire = UnitDebuffID("target",55095, "player")
if dbFrostFever ~= nil then dbexpire =(dbexpire - GetTime()) if dbexpire < 2 and IsSpellInRange("Icy Touch", "target") == 1 then RunMacroText("/startattack") return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: B:Mark of Blood
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 50 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Obliterate
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Obliterate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Pestilence
Ability.Lua:
local dbFrostFever, _, _, _, _, _, FrostFeverExpire = UnitDebuffID("target",55095, "player") local dbBloodPlague, _, _, _, _, _, BloodPlagueExpire = UnitDebuffID("target",55078, "player") local dbFrostFeverO, _, _, _, _, _, FrostFeverExpireO = UnitDebuffID("target",55095) local dbBloodPlagueO, _, _, _, _, _, BloodPlagueExpireO = UnitDebuffID("target",55078)
BloodPlagueExpire =(BloodPlagueExpire - GetTime()) FrostFeverExpire =(FrostFeverExpire - GetTime())
if dbFrostFever == nil and dbBloodPlague == nil and (dbFrostFeverO ~= nil or dbBloodPlagueO ~= nil) then return false elseif (BloodPlagueExpire < 5 or FrostFeverExpire < 5) then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Pestilence (AOE)
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Pestilence", "target") >= 2 then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Pestilence (Renew)
Ability.Lua:
local dbFrostFever, _, _, _, _, _, FrostFeverExpire = UnitDebuffID("target",55095, "player") local dbBloodPlague, _, _, _, _, _, BloodPlagueExpire = UnitDebuffID("target",55078, "player") local dbFrostFeverO, _, _, _, _, _, FrostFeverExpireO = UnitDebuffID("target",55095) local dbBloodPlagueO, _, _, _, _, _, BloodPlagueExpireO = UnitDebuffID("target",55078)
BloodPlagueExpire =(BloodPlagueExpire - GetTime()) FrostFeverExpire =(FrostFeverExpire - GetTime())
if BloodPlagueExpire < 7 or FrostFeverExpire < 7 then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Pestilence (Copy)
U:Pestilence (Tank)
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 60 then return true end

Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 70 then return true end

Ability.Name: F:Pillar of Frost
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Obliterate", "target") == 1 and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: U:Plague Strike
Ability.Lua:
local dbBloodPlague, _, _, _, _, _, BloodPlagueExpire = UnitDebuffID("target",55078, "player")
if dbBloodPlague ~= nil then --cast if debuff has < 2 sec left BloodPlagueExpire =(BloodPlagueExpire - GetTime()) if BloodPlagueExpire < 2 and IsSpellInRange("Plague Strike", "target") == 1 then return true end else return true end
